title: Zootropolis 2 Breaks Hollywood Animated Movie Record
summary: Zootropolis 2 is now Hollywood's biggest animated film ever! It made $1.7 billion at the box office around the world, beating the old record held by Inside Out 2. This movie is a sequel to Zootropolis from 2016 and features characters like Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde. It had a big opening weekend and quickly reached $1 billion. However, the highest-grossing animated movie overall is still Ne Zha 2 from China, which made $2.2 billion. Disney thanked fans for their support in making this success possible.
